instructions.title: ASSIGNMENT INSTRUCTIONS
instructions.content: As the Situation Unit Leader, you are responsible for the supervision of all dispatchers and intelligence units. You should work with your personnel to monitor all field operations and be ready to provide situational updates to the Incident Commanders as necessary.

instructions.title: TRAFFIC CONTROL INSTRUCTIONS
instructions.content: Control traffic flow at intersection Alpha-1. Maintain clear emergency vehicle access and coordinate with adjacent control points.

instructions.title: MEDICAL TEAM INSTRUCTIONS
instructions.content: Provide emergency medical services along the parade route. Maintain ambulance readiness and coordinate with local hospitals.
